title: Thumann's Deli Best
text: The Deli Meats You Can TRUST! Family Owned Since 1949 Thumann’s…The very best since 1949 For four generations, Thumann's is a family owned and operated company that Henry Thumann founded in 1949. Even today, we still use Grandpa Thumann's family recipes. While he is no longer personally doing the preparation, our butchers are still using his methods. Thumann's has become one of the largest, most modern, and environmentally conscious meat processing facilities in the United States. Healthy, nutritious products aren't just our family's business; they are our way of life! Order your family favorites today! WE BELIEVE OUR PRODUCTS ARE ONLY AS GOOD AS THE INGREDIENTS WE USE. Our Promise To You The Deli Best: Our family recipes use the least amounts of salt & sugar, and we never use any artificial flavors or colors, by-products, fillers or gluten. Our products are trans fat free and contain absolutely no MSG. A family owned and operated business since 1949. Our history of exceptional recipes and products started with our grandfather who came to America from Germany at the age of 17. Our passion for the best quality runs four generations deep!
